metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20458 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In radare2 prior to 3.1.1, r_bin_dyldcache_extract in libr/bin/format/mach0/dyldcache.c may allow attackers to cause a denial-of-service (application crash caused by out-of-bounds read) by crafting an input file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20458` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libradare2-4.2.1 - 3.1.2+dfsg-1.1
libradare2-common - 3.1.2+dfsg-1.1
radare2 - 3.1.2+dfsg-1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: radare2 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.2+dfsg-1.1').
